title: Archive Network AE
description: DICOM Archive Network AE related information

dcmMetadataStorageID.title: Metadata Storage ID
dcmMetadataStorageID.description: ID of Storage on which Metadata is stored in JSON format - additionally to the complete DICOM composite object - of objects received by this AE. Overwrites value specified on Device level.

dcmSeriesMetadataDelay.title: Aggregate Series Metadata Delay
dcmSeriesMetadataDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS for storing aggregated Series Metadata on storage of objects received by this AE. Overwrites value specified on Device level.

dcmPurgeInstanceRecordsDelay.title: Purge Instance Records Delay
dcmPurgeInstanceRecordsDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS for purging Instance Records from the DB received by this AE. Overwrites value specified on Device level.

dcmStoreAccessControlID.title: Store Access Control ID
dcmStoreAccessControlID.description: Access Contol ID assigned to Studies received by this AE

dcmStoreAccessControlIDRule.title: Store Access Control Rules
dcmStoreAccessControlIDRule.description: Store Access Control Rules applied to Studies received by this AE

dcmAccessControlID.title: Access Control ID
dcmAccessControlID.description: Access Contol IDs assigned to Query/Retrieve requests received by this AE

dcmAcceptedMoveDestination.title: Accepted Move Destination
dcmAcceptedMoveDestination.description: Accepted Move Destination in C-MOVE requests; any if absent.

dcmOverwritePolicy.title: Overwrite Policy
dcmOverwritePolicy.description: Overwrite Policy: NEVER, ALWAYS, SAME_SOURCE, SAME_SERIES or SAME_SOURCE_AND_SERIES. NEVER if absent.

dcmAcceptMissingPatientID.title: Accept Missing Patient ID
dcmAcceptMissingPatientID.description: Indicates if objects without Patient IDs shall be accepted and if a Patient ID shall be created. Enumerated values: YES, NO, CREATE. If absent, CREATE will be applied.

dcmAcceptConflictingPatientID.title: Accept Conflicting Patient ID
dcmAcceptConflictingPatientID.description: Indicates if objects with a Patient IDs which differs from the Patient ID in previous received objects of the Study shall be accepted. Enumerated values: YES, NO, MERGED(= accept prior Patient IDs). If absent, MERGED will be applied.

dcmBulkDataSpoolDirectory.title: Bulk Data Spool Directory
dcmBulkDataSpoolDirectory.description: Path to Bulk Data Spool Directory

dcmHideSPSWithStatusFromMWL.title: Hide SPS with Status
dcmHideSPSWithStatusFromMWL.description: Scheduled Procedure Step Status codes of MWL items which shall not be returned by the MWL SCP

dcmValidateCallingAEHostname.title: Validate Calling AE Hostname
dcmValidateCallingAEHostname.description: Validate Calling AE Hostname or IP Address of Association requestors for this AE; use value configured on Device level, if absent

dcmPersonNameComponentOrderInsensitiveMa.title: Person Name Component Order Insensitive Matching
dcmPersonNameComponentOrderInsensitiveMa.description: Indicates if name component order insensitive matching is performed on fuzzy semantic matching of person names; disabled if absent

dcmSendPendingCGet.title: Send Pending C-Get
dcmSendPendingCGet.description: Enables pending C-GET responses; disabled if absent

dcmSendPendingCMoveInterval.title: Send Pending C-Move Interval
dcmSendPendingCMoveInterval.description: Interval of pending C-MOVE responses in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS; disabled if absent

dcmWadoSR2HtmlTemplateURI.title: Wado SR2 Html Template URI
dcmWadoSR2HtmlTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used to render structured reports to html

dcmWadoSR2TextTemplateURI.title: Wado SR2 Text Template URI
dcmWadoSR2TextTemplateURI.description: Specifies URI for the style sheet used to render structured reports to plain text

dcmQidoMaxNumberOfResults.title: Qido Max Number Of Results
dcmQidoMaxNumberOfResults.description: Maximal number of return results by QIDO-RS Service. 0 (=unlimited) if absent

dcmFwdMppsDestination.title: Mpps Forward Destination
dcmFwdMppsDestination.description: Destination to forward MPPS N-CREATE RQ and N-SET RQ

dcmIanDestination.title: Ian Destination
dcmIanDestination.description: Destination to send IAN N-CREATE RQ

dcmIanDelay.title: IAN Delay
dcmIanDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which an IAN for a received study is sent to configured IAN destinations. If absent, IANs are triggered by received MPPS

dcmIanTimeout.title: IAN Timeout
dcmIanTimeout.description: Timeout in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS for waiting on receive of instances referenced in MPPS; check for completeness forever if absent

dcmIanOnTimeout.title: IAN On Timeout
dcmIanOnTimeout.description: Specifies if the IAN is sent if the timeout for waiting on receive of instances referenced is exceeded; just stop check for completeness on timeout if absent

dcmFallbackCMoveSCP.title: Fallback C-Move SCP
dcmFallbackCMoveSCP.description: AE Title of external C-MOVE SCP to forward C-MOVE RQs if the requested Entities are not managed by this archive

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPStudyOlderThan.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Study Older Than
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPStudyOlderThan.description: Specifies threshold for Study Date in format YYYYMMDD for marking received Studies as (potential) incomplete to enforce the retrieve from configured dcmFallbackCMoveSCP

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPDestination.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Destination
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPDestination.description: AE Title of local C-STORE-SCP to be set as Move Destination in C-MOVE RQs forwarded to the external C-MOVE SCP specified by dcmFallbackCMoveSCP

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPLeadingCFindSCP.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Leading C-Find SCP
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPLeadingCFindSCP.description: AE Title of external C-FIND SCP for Verification of Number of Instances retrieved from external C-MOVE SCP specified by dcmFallbackCMoveSCP.

dcmFallbackCMoveSCPRetries.title: Fallback C-Move SCP Retries
dcmFallbackCMoveSCPRetries.description: Maximal number of retries to retrieve not available objects from C-MOVE SCP configured by dcmFallbackCMoveSCP. -1 = forever. Use value configured on Device level, if absent

dcmAltCMoveSCP.title: Alternative C-Move SCP
dcmAltCMoveSCP.description: AE Title of alternative C-MOVE SCP to forward C-MOVE RQs if the requested Entities are not located on a local attached Storage

dcmStorePermissionServiceURL.title: Store Permission Service URL
dcmStorePermissionServiceURL.description: URL of Store Permission Service which will be invoked on receive of the first object of a study. {<dicomTag>} will be replaced by the value of the attribute in the object. E.g. http://host.name/storage-permission/study/{0020000D}?patientId={00100020}&patientIdIssuer={00100021}&studyDescription={00081030}

dcmStorePermissionServiceResponsePattern.title: Store Permission Service Response Pattern
dcmStorePermissionServiceResponsePattern.description: Regular Expression applied to responses from Store Permission Service to determine agreement for storage. E.g. "validation"\s*:\s*"true" . If absent, every success response will be treated as agreement for storage.

dcmAllowRejectionForDataRetentionPolicyE.title: Allow Rejection For Data Retention Policy Expired
dcmAllowRejectionForDataRetentionPolicyE.description: Allow Rejection For Data Retention Policy Expired : NEVER, ALWAYS, STUDY_RETENTION_POLICY. If absent, STUDY_RETENTION_POLICY will be applied.

dcmAcceptedUserRole.title: Accepted User Role
dcmAcceptedUserRole.description: Roles of users from which web requests are accepted; any if absent.

dcmAllowDeleteStudyPermanently.title: Allow Delete Study permanently
dcmAllowDeleteStudyPermanently.description: Allow to delete Study permanently. Enumerated values: ALWAYS, REJECTED (= only already rejected Studies). If absent, REJECTED will be applied.

dcmStorePermissionServiceExpirationDateP.title: Store Permission Service Expiration Date Pattern
dcmStorePermissionServiceExpirationDateP.description: Regular Expression applied to responses from Store Permission Service to extract the initial Study Expiration Date. E.g. "expirationdate"\s*:\s*"([0-9]{8})". If absent, locally configured Study Retention Policy Rules will be applied.

dcmDefaultCharacterSet.title: Default Character Set
dcmDefaultCharacterSet.description: Value of Specific Character Set (0008,0005) added to Data Sets without Specific Character Set (0008,0005) attribute received by the Network AE.

dcmStorePermissionServiceErrorCommentPat.title: Store Permission Service Error Comment Pattern
dcmStorePermissionServiceErrorCommentPat.description: Regular Expression applied to responses from Store Permission Service to extract Error Comment. E.g. "errorcomment"\s*:\s*"(.*)". If absent, the Error Comment will be "Storage denied".

dcmStorePermissionServiceErrorCodePatter.title: Store Permission Service Error Code Pattern
dcmStorePermissionServiceErrorCodePatter.description: Regular Expression applied to responses from Store Permission Service to extract Error Code in hexadecimal. E.g. "errorcode"\s*:\s*"(\p{XDigit}{4})". If absent, the Error Code will be 0124H (Not Authorized).

dcmRetrieveAET.title: Retrieve AE Title
dcmRetrieveAET.description: AE Title associated with Network AE

dcmExternalRetrieveAEDestination.title: External Retrieve AE Destination
dcmExternalRetrieveAEDestination.description: AE Title of local C-STORE-SCP to be set as Move Destination in C-MOVE RQs forwarded to external retrieve AE.

hl7PSUSendingApplication.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update Sending Application
hl7PSUSendingApplication.description: Application|Facility name of Sending Application for HL7 Procedure Status Update. HL7 Procedure Status Update disabled, if absent.

hl7PSUReceivingApplication.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update Receiving Application
hl7PSUReceivingApplication.description: Application|Facility name of Receiving Application for HL7 Procedure Status Update.

hl7PSUDelay.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update Delay
hl7PSUDelay.description: Delay in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS after which an HL7 Procedure Status Update for a received study is sent to configured HL7 receivers. If absent, HL7 Procedure Status Update is triggered by received MPPS.

hl7PSUMWL.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update MWL
hl7PSUMWL.description: Specifies if the Status of MWL Items in the DB is updated to COMPLETED for a received study after the configured HL7 Procedure Status Update Delay. Disabled, if absent.

hl7PSUTimeout.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update Timeout
hl7PSUTimeout.description: Timeout in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn.nS for waiting on receive of instances referenced in MPPS; check for completeness forever if absent.

hl7PSUOnTimeout.title: HL7 Procedure Status Update On Timeout
hl7PSUOnTimeout.description: Specifies if the HL7 Procedure Status Update is sent if the timeout for waiting on receive of instances referenced is exceeded; just stop check for completeness on timeout if absent.

dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion.title: Archive Attribute Coercion
dcmArchiveAttributeCoercion.description: Archive Attribute Coercion of received/sent DIMSE
